item.title: Sniper [Medium] - Windows
item.description: Sniper was one of my favorite boxes from recent memory, and uses RFI and Powershell constrained mode to eventually get a user shell. From there you poison a Windows Help (CHM) file in order to execute code as the Administrator user. Let’s take a look at how I did it. First up, from my standard nmap scan, we see : nmap -A -oA nmap/snipper_initial -vvv 10.10.10.151 Nmap scan report for 10.
